Anyone found a fix for the chapter 2 "floor bug" ?

For all who have floor-bug (i was thinking and thinking and got solve of this problem):

1. Go to Options and set all to lower settings as possible (resolution 640, details LOW, and game in the window - not Fullscreen)
2. Exit the game
3. Start the game (it should work at the window)
4. Load Chapter 1 (Not Chapter 2 or Autosave)
5. Go again through the map
6. Skip all movies
7. You should start Chapter 2 ON the floor, not IN ;]
8. Now You can back to Your own settings

Cheers!
